includedAssets.title: Pilot
includedAssets.synopsis: Quirky and built on smart scripting, this skewed US sitcom celebrates the drama and dysfunction of three left-field families. A twisted tour of relative chaos.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Quirky and built on smart scripting, this skewed US sitcom celebrates the drama and dysfunction of three left-field families.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Quirky and built on smart scripting, this skewed US sitcom celebrates the drama and dysfunction of three left-field families. A twisted tour of relative chaos.

includedAssets.title: The Bicycle Thief
includedAssets.synopsis: What makes a good dad? Phil tries to teach his son to take responsibility, and Cam and Mitchell attend a toddler playgroup. Funny and feelgood.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: What makes a good dad? Phil tries to teach his son to take responsibility, and Cam and Mitchell attend a toddler playgroup. Funny and feelgood.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: What makes a good dad? Phil tries to teach his son to take responsibility, and Cam and Mitchell attend a toddler playgroup. Funny and feelgood.

includedAssets.title: Come Fly With Me
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep3 - Come Fly With Me
includedAssets.synopsis: Hilarity ensues during bonding sessions between unlikely pairings. Phil's relationship with Jay nosedives, and Gloria boosts her granddaughter's confidence.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Hilarity ensues during bonding sessions between unlikely pairings. Phil's relationship with Jay nosedives.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Hilarity ensues during bonding sessions between unlikely pairings. Phil's relationship with Jay nosedives, and Gloria boosts her granddaughter's confidence.

includedAssets.title: The Incident
includedAssets.synopsis: Cheers comedienne Shelley Long is on scene-snatching form as Jay's estranged ex-wife. DeDe is back in town to make amends, but things don't quite go to plan.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Cheers comedienne Shelley Long is on scene-snatching form as Jay's estranged ex-wife who is back in town to make amends.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Cheers comedienne Shelley Long is on scene-snatching form as Jay's estranged ex-wife. DeDe is back in town to make amends, but things don't quite go to plan.

includedAssets.title: Coal Digger
includedAssets.synopsis: Tension simmers between Claire and Gloria following an incident at school between Luke and Manny. But things escalate when accusations and insults are thrown.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Tension simmers between Claire and Gloria following an incident at school between Luke and Manny.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Tension simmers between Claire and Gloria following an incident at school between Luke and Manny. But things escalate when accusations and insults are thrown.

includedAssets.title: Run For Your Wife
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep6 - Run For Your Wife
includedAssets.synopsis: It's a day of firsts: Mitch and Cam flap when Lily gets her first bump on the head, and it's the first day of term for the Dunphy brood. Clever comedy.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: It's a day of firsts: Mitch and Cam flap when Lily gets her first bump on the head, and it's the first day of term for the Dunphy brood.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: It's a day of firsts: Mitch and Cam flap when Lily gets her first bump on the head, and it's the first day of term for the Dunphy brood. Clever comedy.

includedAssets.title: En Garde
includedAssets.synopsis: The competitive spirits of certain individuals are ignited when Manny takes up fencing. Phil, meanwhile, sets out to find where Luke's talents lie.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The competitive spirits of certain individuals are ignited when Manny takes up fencing. Phil, meanwhile, sets out to find where Luke's talents lie.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The competitive spirits of certain individuals are ignited when Manny takes up fencing. Phil, meanwhile, sets out to find where Luke's talents lie.

includedAssets.title: Great Expectations
includedAssets.synopsis: Edward Norton and Elizabeth Banks guest star as Claire tries to find Phil the perfect anniversary gift.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Edward Norton and Elizabeth Banks guest star as Claire tries to find Phil the perfect anniversary gift.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Edward Norton and Elizabeth Banks guest star as Claire tries to find Phil the perfect anniversary gift.

includedAssets.title: Fizbo
includedAssets.synopsis: Calamity ensues as the Dunphys throw Luke a party. It's a memorable day, especially when Cam shows up as Fizbo the clown...
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Calamity ensues as the Dunphys throw Luke a party. It's a memorable day, especially when Cam shows up as Fizbo the clown...
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Calamity ensues as the Dunphys throw Luke a party. It's a memorable day, especially when Cam shows up as Fizbo the clown...

includedAssets.title: Undeck The Halls
includedAssets.synopsis: This seasonal special reminds us that Christmas is about giggling as well as giving. Claire and Phil go all Grinch-y, and Lily is taken to see Santa.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: This seasonal special reminds us that Christmas is about giggling as well as giving. Claire and Phil go all Grinch-y, and Lily is taken to see Santa.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: This seasonal special reminds us that Christmas is about giggling as well as giving. Claire and Phil go all Grinch-y, and Lily is taken to see Santa.

includedAssets.title: Up All Night
includedAssets.synopsis: It's all about the ex factor as Javier Delgado, Manny's infamously unreliable dad, stirs up trouble in the Pritchett household. Guest starring Benjamin Bratt.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: It's all about the ex factor as Javier Delgado, Manny's infamously unreliable dad, stirs up trouble in the Pritchett household.

includedAssets.title: Not In My House
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep12 - Not In My House
includedAssets.synopsis: Comedy gold is mined when Claire finds an X-rated image on her computer... Meanwhile, Jay and Gloria argue over a life-sized statue and bona fide eyesore.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Claire finds an X-rated image on her computer... Meanwhile, Jay and Gloria argue over a life-sized statue and bona fide eyesore.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Comedy gold is mined when Claire finds an X-rated image on her computer... Meanwhile, Jay and Gloria argue over a life-sized statue and bona fide eyesore.

includedAssets.title: Fifteen Percent
includedAssets.synopsis: Mitchell sows the seed that one of Jay's buddies is secretly gay and Claire wages war against a remote control. Oscar nominee Chazz Palminteri guest stars.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Mitchell sows the seed that one of Jay's buddies is secretly gay and Claire wages war against a remote control.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Mitchell sows the seed that one of Jay's buddies is secretly gay and Claire wages war against a remote control. Oscar nominee Chazz Palminteri guest stars.

includedAssets.title: Moon Landing
includedAssets.synopsis: Claire feels inadequate when an old friend comes to visit. Meanwhile, Jay has an unsettling locker room encounter. Oscar nominee Minnie Driver guest stars.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Claire feels inadequate when an old friend comes to visit. Meanwhile, Jay has an unsettling locker room encounter.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Claire feels inadequate when an old friend comes to visit. Meanwhile, Jay has an unsettling locker room encounter. Oscar nominee Minnie Driver guest stars.

includedAssets.title: My Funky Valentine
includedAssets.synopsis: It's Valentine's Day and, while Phil and Claire plan a special trip, Jay woos Gloria by taking her to a stand-up show. Expect varying romantic results.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: It's Valentine's Day and, while Phil and Claire plan a special trip, Jay woos Gloria by taking her to a stand-up show.

includedAssets.title: Fears
includedAssets.synopsis: Get reacquainted with the delectably dysfunctional clan as they reveal their fears. While Phil deals with the dark, Manny overcomes an aversion to roller coasters.

includedAssets.title: Truth Be Told
includedAssets.synopsis: Hilarity ensues when Phil is reunited with a frisky former flame. Meanwhile, Mitch confronts his boss and Jay delivers some bad news.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Hilarity ensues when Phil is reunited with a frisky former flame. Meanwhile, Mitch confronts his boss and Jay delivers some bad news.

includedAssets.title: Starry Night
includedAssets.synopsis: Mitchell and Manny find out they've got more in common than they thought, and Cameron and Gloria spend some quality time together.

includedAssets.title: Game Changer
includedAssets.synopsis: It's Phil's birthday and he desperately wants the year's must-have gadget. Meanwhile, Mitchell tries to find his inner mean machine. Smartly scripted sitcom.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: It's Phil's birthday and he desperately wants the year's must-have gadget. Meanwhile, Mitchell tries to find his inner mean machine.

includedAssets.title: Benched
includedAssets.synopsis: When Luke and Manny's basketball coach quits, Jay and Phil lobby for the position. Meanwhile, Mitch introduces Cam to a prospective employer. Smash hit sitcom.

includedAssets.title: Travels With Scout
includedAssets.synopsis: Claire's suspicions are aroused by Grandpa Dunphy's impromptu arrival, and Cam drums up the courage to join Dylan's band. Fred Willard guest stars.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Claire's suspicions are aroused by Grandpa Dunphy's impromptu arrival, and Cam drums up the courage to join Dylan's band. Fred Willard guest stars.

includedAssets.title: Airport 2010
includedAssets.synopsis: Check-in for more comedy goodness. It's Jay's birthday and Gloria plans a romantic getaway. But there's a catch, the rest of the clan will be joining them.

includedAssets.title: Hawaii
includedAssets.synopsis: Jay receives a reality check, and Phil tries his Cupid charms on Claire. Plus, there are pratfalls in paradise when the kids are left to their own devices.

includedAssets.title: Family Portrait
includedAssets.synopsis: First season finale of the cleverly crafted comedy. Claire's plans for a family portrait go awry, Cam unleashes his inner diva and Mitch gets into a flap.

includedAssets.synopsis: Meet the Dunphys, Tuckers and Pritchetts in the side-splitting first season of the hit US comedy. Emmy award-winning comedy starring Ty Burrell and Sofia Vergara.

includedAssets.title: Season 6
includedAssets.synopsis: Big changes are in store for the family as Cam and Mitch adjust to married life, Hayley turns 21 and Alex prepares to graduate high school. Season six of the smash-hit comedy starring Ty Burrell and Sofia Vergara.

includedIn.title: Modern Family
includedIn.synopsis: Three different, but related families face trials and tribulations in their own uniquely comedic ways.

title: Modern Family Seasons 1-6
synopsis: Much-loved US comedy about an extended family going through the ups and downs of modern life. Ty Burrell, Sofia Vergara and Jesse Tyler Ferguson feature in a top ensemble cast.
shortSynopsis: US comedy about a family going through the ups and downs of modern life.
